description: Transitional Capacity Support to the Public Administration of Moldova

subproject.corporate outcome: National, regional and local levels of governance expand their capacities to manage the equitable delivery of public services
subproject.description: The project seeks to address urgent short-term capacity needs of the public administration. To catalyze the work of the more stable civil service, new capacity will be introduced in several line ministries through “change agents”. They will work on a consultancy basis for a finite period to focus on the change and reform process. Complementary, training, internships and incentives will be rolled out to develop skills and encourage better performance by existing civil servants.
subproject.title: Transitional Capacity Support
